name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Amazon SES contacts
description:
Make will watch your Amazon SES contacts and add them to your Google Sheets as rows. 
Here's the [spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FeaALMYAUmUlQssrMVCIyvojkX5V9tpNXgo9rS_9egA/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
